metadata.title: CVE-2017-13144 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description:
In ImageMagick before 6.9.7-10, there is a crash (rather than a "width or height exceeds limit" error report) if the image dimensions are too large, as demonstrated by use of the mpc coder.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-13144` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagick++-6.q16-8 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-8 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16-6-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> 0085-Avoid-a-crash-in-mpc-coder.patch in unstable 0081-Avoid-a-crash-in-mpc-coder.patch in stretch 0297-CVE-2017-13144-Fix-application-crash-if-image-dimensions-are-too-large.patch in wheezy 0261-CVE-2017-13144.patch in jessie sbeattie> this fix introduced a regression in xenial and trusty (LP: #1793485) and was reverted for those releases in USN 3785-1

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2').
